go_data.justification: Ang-II can stimulate NADPH oxidases 2 (Nox2) activity through the TGF-beta1 pathway.
Ang-II-induced HAFs were used as a cell model of atrial fibrosis.
Smad3 signalling has been shown to participate in cardiac fibrosis and was activated in Ang-II-treated HAFs.
Ang-II-treated HAFs were used to study the effects of Ang-II on cell proliferation and migration.
